name: Heróis do Mar
description:
Heróis do Mar is arena brawler in which the characters are portuguese historical figures. Each character has their own abilities that the players have to skillfully use to defeat their oponents.

Historical Figures

Choose from a roster of characters connected with portuguese history. Poets, War heros, Royalty, Singers, among others.

Unique abilities

Each character has different abilities that represent part of it's history, personality, or myths.

Controls (PS4 Controller)

  • Left Analog - Move
  • Right Analog - Rotate Character
  • R1 - Basic Ability
  • L1 - Movement Ability
  • L2 - Secondary Ability
  • R2 - Ultimate Ability
  • Options - Pause Game

PS: It cannot be played online. It is couch multiplayer only.

This game was developed as part of the  the course of Videojogos(Videogames) at Universidade Lusófona de Humanidades e Tecnologias in Lisbon,Portugal.
